name: Clicker (developed with a free cross-platform game engine, RCBasic)
name_original: Clicker (developed with a free cross-platform game engine, RCBasic)
description:
Hello, Clicker is another game example made by me.  It is a little action game but it is entertaining. If you want to learn RCBasic, the source code of this game example may be quite suitable for you. Join the community for further interesting discussions!
https://rcbasic.freeforums.net/

By the way, there were two very important news recently: 

1. RCBasic version 3.12 was released. Some important improvements were nicely done in the version. This new version is so surprising! https://rcbasic.freeforums.net/thread/391/rcbasic-v3-12-release

2. One community member joined the 10th SyntaxBomb game programming contest. The name of this member's  game is Asterocks. Asterocks can show the potential of RCBasic. You can download Asterocks and the other amazing entries of the contest on the following webpage:
https://www.syntaxbomb.com/index.php/topic,7888.0.html
